title: Blood Ties
description:
A teenage boy discovers family in the last way anyone wants as bloodthirsty monsters from the countryside. 
Pablo Santos probably shouldn't try to crack the secret question to his dad's email account. Probably. But after getting into trouble in school yet again--for something that he swears wasn't his fault--he decides to run off to the countryside with his best friend, Rachel Ann, to discover the answer to such a mind-numbingly simple "Where was my father born?" Because Pablo knows nothing about his father and even less about his past.Come and explore the Bicol countryside with Pablo and his ride or die best friend, Rachel Ann, as they stumble upon toothy secrets with a side of blood.
author: K.S. Villoso
